hero.intro: Specializing in robotics automation, computer vision, and AI-driven solutions. Passionate about building intelligent systems that solve real-world problems with cutting-edge technology.

projects.title: Automatic Optical Fiber Inspection
projects.description: Developed an automated inspection system using UR5 collaborative robot integrated with advanced anomaly detection models to identify microscopic dust particles (15–25µm) on optical fiber connectors. Achieved 98% detection accuracy with real-time processing capabilities.

projects.title: AOI of PCBs (VLM + ResNet + PatchVORE)
projects.description: Designed an Automated Optical Inspection (AOI) system for printed circuit boards combining Vision-Language Models, ResNet architecture, and PatchVORE technology. System detects defects with 95%+ accuracy, reducing manual inspection time by 70%.

projects.title: Funny Face-Tracking Robot
projects.description: Built an interactive robot that uses real-time face detection and tracking to follow human movements. Features include emotion recognition, playful responses, and smooth servo motor control for natural head movements.

projects.title: AI-RAG Chatbot with FOB Escalation
projects.description: Developed an intelligent chatbot using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) architecture with decision-making capabilities for Front-of-Building (FOB) escalation. Integrates with enterprise knowledge bases to provide contextual responses and automated ticket routing.

papers.title: Advanced Anomaly Detection in Optical Fiber Manufacturing Using Deep Learning
papers.abstract: This paper presents a novel approach to detecting microscopic defects in optical fiber connectors using a custom deep learning architecture. Our method achieves 98% accuracy in identifying particles as small as 15µm.

papers.title: Integrating Vision-Language Models for Automated PCB Inspection
papers.abstract: We propose a hybrid approach combining Vision-Language Models with traditional CNNs for PCB defect detection, demonstrating superior performance in complex inspection scenarios.

papers.title: Real-Time Face Tracking for Interactive Robotics Applications
papers.abstract: A lightweight face tracking system optimized for embedded systems, enabling natural human-robot interaction with minimal computational overhead.
